page.title: 03FAVOURITE TOY
page.content:
The most popular toy in our school is a bike but most children don't have a favourite toy.Eleven children out of our school don't have a favourite toy.The least liked toys used in our school are Britain's toys, Roland Rat,(Roland Rat is a toy puppet) Star Wars (Star Wars is a space film with models based on it) computer, tractor, remote controlled jeep.More popular than these were Teddy Bears, Sindy Dolls,(Sindy Dolls are plastic they have clothes and houses) Lego building bricks. Most children from our school like to go for bike rides those who have BMX's go on BMX tracks.
by Patrina Hughes.
